descriptionHtml:
The Crusader is a 2handed sword which can be crafted with the daedric smithing perk.  This is my first mod and is not the final version so any feedback will be helpful.  I just freestyled the model so it is still a work in progress.

v2.0
-finished model
-finished textures (still no blood though)

Installation:
Use NMM to install
or
Unpack and drop the .esp into your Skyrim Data folder. Put the folders located in the textures<weapons and the meshes<weapons  into the corresponding Skyrim directories.

Uninstall
Delete the .esp in your Data folder and the \"The Crusader\" folders located in the meshes<weapons and textures<weapons

Feature Updates
-add blood fx

PS. \"help crusader 4\" if you are to lazy to craft it.
author: Rudeboy13

files.name: The Crusader v2
files.changelogHtml:
Finished weapon model
Finished Texturing (still no blood tho)
